1.8.9.2.2.3: Fixes AIOB error from explosion particles.

1.8.8.2.1.9: tweaks to pathfinding, added a JPS like pathfinder, added support for larger hitboxes for pathing.
1.8.8.2.1.8: expands on customizability of terrain segments.
1.8.8.2.1.7: increase minimum size for checking collisions, fixes small mobs sometimes falling through floor
1.8.8.2.1.6: tweaks to blast code, fixed API issues, fixed error in version update message
1.8.8.2.1.5: tweaks to matrix code, added forge version checking
